message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you.  Given its value and potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,500,000.

Alice, your initial offer is significantly higher than what I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $800,000 at this time.  This is my best and final offer, as I'm comfortable walking away and buying from John.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider this offer. While I understand your perspective, my valuation is based on the unique aspects and potential of this product. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still above my budget. I'm sticking with my initial offer of $800,000.  This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll be purchasing from John.
